verbs.description: Op - ed : [ARG0: The distractions of Donald Trump 's presidency] [V: draw] [ARG1: us] [ARGM-DIR: away from meaningful debate on serious policy issues] , says E.J. Dionne Jr.
Op - ed : The distractions of Donald Trump 's presidency draw us away from meaningful debate on serious policy issues , [V: says] [ARG0: E.J. Dionne Jr.]
